product_name: Onlyleaf Chamomile Green Tea, 27 Tea Bags (25 Tea Bags + 2 FREE Exotic Samples): Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: In general,I have issues falling asleep at night. When someone recommended the only leaf chamomile tea, I was a tad bit sceptic . But it proves its worth. The only leaf concept of having full leaves in a see through gauze which when dipped into hot water infuses the calming aroma as well as the taste to the tea , thus helping my body to calm down. I'd totally recommend this product for all who require a little something to help them to calm their minds.Tip: it works far better when the tea bag is dipped while the water is being boiled.

Of late, I have been having trouble with my sleep. Read somewhere about having Chamomile tea before sleep. Got Onlyleaf after reading the reviews. I am not disappointed at all. The product is top notch - packaging, nylon tea bags. Very premium stuff. I'm into black teas and Chinese teas, so the taste isn't a big bother. Have been having it for a few days now. Seems to be helping. Will order more in future.

reviews.review_title: Not camomile tea but just a Green tea!
reviews.review_body: Well.. Boxing looks pretty, sachet looks so good as if you wanna buy, on top of that they are giving few 2 tea bags and honey sachet, reviews are good , all these are good but actual reality is they are not totally camomile green tea but more of Green tea.. Just very few camomiles are in there, so this is not camomile tea which has so many Benefits but a simply green tea with some flavour.. and it's true that they have added no dust in the teas just the pure leaves.. So people who are looking for camomile tea, this isn't the right choice..

reviews.review_title: Best Green Tea BUT ONE BIG ISSUE
reviews.review_body: The chamomile green tea is amazing and the taste is really nice.... Best I ever had in all the green teas.... BUT IF YOU CAN SEE A WHITE SPOT on the tea bag,guess what it is? It is the GLUE the used to stick thread to the bag, YES, now how am I Supposed to drink this tea with glue in it for God sakes improve your package or you will lose a lot of your customer base and mind it no one will buy such stuff again even if it's good

I took for first night and feel drowsy.Feel I drunked.Next day morning also feeling drowsy.It was not good sleep.i tried to call mobile number given in only leaf but mobile was switched off.no other alternative number in website too.I want to return it but no response.pl be careful using this product.I have doubt about the ingredients.

I used  various  green tea  of different companies  but this time ordered  with amazon  only leaf green  tea  of chamomile  green  tea..... flavor  is original  like natural ,, presentation  is awesome,,  and scent is giving  natural freshment,,,  this green  tea comes  fully  coated with strainer  cloth feel,  very  good after using produuct,,,, hope you give this feeling  always  and maintain  originality  of your  product with best economic price range.

reviews.review_title: THE BEST TEA IN THE BUDGET
reviews.review_body: This review could be long but read it till the end if you are considering buying this product.1.Delivery - The product was delivered to me in less than 24 hours with packaging as intact as possible.2.Presentation - The packing of this product looks extremely minimalist and that is what top brands do.There is no info on the packaging that you do not need.The teabags looked presentable too and the honey sachets were on point too.3.Quality - The company delivers what it promises.There were only whole leaves in the pyramind shaped tea bag and nothing else.As soon as I took out a teabag to make a cup of tea,I encountered a mild aroma that felt like I was in a tea field.The flavor is quite remarkable and the tea did not taste bitter at all.So if you are reading my review till now I request you to click that buy now button and order the best tea in this budget.

reviews.review_title: Only Leaf just made my day !
reviews.review_body: Before buying this pack of chamomile green tea, I have already finished three tea sampler boxes. I like trying various teas, so I went for Only Leaf sampler box. I must say I was impressed with the packaging of tea bags. They are triangular in shape unlike the generic tea bag. They contain the actual ingredients mentioned on the small satchets. One thing I love about them is that each satchet not only has a vibrant colour but also mentions the benefits of the tea inside. It really helps me choose my tea for the day. I bought this pack of chamomile tea this time because it really helps me get a good night's sleep and eases period cramps too. Only Leaf really is one of a kind. It has changed the meaning of tea time for a tea lover like me.I also received two free samples of jasmine tea along with two super cute honey twigs. I am flattered. Very very happy with the product. ðŸ¥°
